TestCase.name: testCrossWithUnnest
TestCase.Resource: SELECT a, s FROM MyTable, UNNEST(MyTable.c) as A (s)

LogicalProject(select=[a, s]) +- LogicalCorrelate(correlation=[$cor0], joinType=[inner], requiredColumns=[{2}]) :- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable]]) +- LogicalProject(select=[s]) +- Uncollect +- LogicalProject(c=[$cor0.c]) +- LogicalValues(tuples=[[{ 0 }]])

LogicalProject(select=[a, s]) +- LogicalCorrelate(correlation=[$cor0], joinType=[inner], requiredColumns=[{2}]) :- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable]]) +- LogicalProject(select=[s]) +- LogicalTableFunctionScan(invocation=[$UNNEST_ROWS$1($cor0.c)], rowType=[RecordType:peek_no_expand(VARCHAR(2147483647) f0)])

TestCase.name: testCrossWithUnnestForMap
TestCase.Resource: SELECT a, b, v FROM MyTable CROSS JOIN UNNEST(c) as f(k, v)

LogicalProject(select=[a, b, v]) +- LogicalCorrelate(correlation=[$cor0], joinType=[inner], requiredColumns=[{2}]) :- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable]]) +- LogicalProject(select=[k, v]) +- Uncollect +- LogicalProject(c=[$cor0.c]) +- LogicalValues(tuples=[[{ 0 }]])

TestCase.name: testJoinWithUnnestOfTuple
TestCase.Resource: SELECT a, b, x, y FROM (SELECT a, b FROM MyTable WHERE a < 3) as tf, UNNEST(tf.b) as A (x, y) WHERE x > a

LogicalProject(select=[a, b, x, y]) +- LogicalFilter(condition=[>($2, $0)]) +- LogicalCorrelate(correlation=[$cor0], joinType=[inner], requiredColumns=[{1}]) :- LogicalProject(select=[a, b]) : +- LogicalFilter(condition=[<($0, 3)]) : +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable]]) +- LogicalProject(select=[x, y]) +- Uncollect +- LogicalProject(b=[$cor0.b]) +- LogicalValues(tuples=[[{ 0 }]])

LogicalProject(select=[a, b, x, y]) +- LogicalFilter(condition=[>($2, $0)]) +- LogicalCorrelate(correlation=[$cor0], joinType=[inner], requiredColumns=[{1}]) :- LogicalProject(select=[a, b]) : +- LogicalFilter(condition=[<($0, 3)]) : +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable]]) +- LogicalProject(select=[x, y]) +- LogicalTableFunctionScan(invocation=[$UNNEST_ROWS$1($cor0.b)], rowType=[RecordType:peek_no_expand(INTEGER _1, VARCHAR(2147483647) _2)])

TestCase.name: testLeftUnnestMultiSetFromCollectResult
TestCase.Resource: WITH T AS (SELECT a, COLLECT(b) as `set` FROM MyTable GROUP BY a) SELECT a, s FROM T LEFT JOIN UNNEST(T.`set`) AS A(s) ON TRUE WHERE a < 5

LogicalProject(select=[a, s]) +- LogicalFilter(condition=[<($0, 5)]) +- LogicalCorrelate(correlation=[$cor0], joinType=[left], requiredColumns=[{1}]) :- LogicalAggregate(group=[{0}], set=[COLLECT($1)]) : +- LogicalProject(select=[a, b]) : +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable]]) +- LogicalProject(select=[s]) +- Uncollect +- LogicalProject(set=[$cor0.set]) +- LogicalValues(tuples=[[{ 0 }]])

TestCase.name: testUnnestWithOrdinalityMap
TestCase.Resource: SELECT id, k, v, pos FROM MyTable CROSS JOIN UNNEST(map_data) WITH ORDINALITY AS f(k, v, pos)

LogicalProject(select=[id, k, v, pos]) +- LogicalCorrelate(correlation=[$cor0], joinType=[inner], requiredColumns=[{1}]) :- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable]]) +- LogicalProject(select=[k, v, pos]) +- Uncollect(withOrdinality=[true]) +- LogicalProject(map_data=[$cor0.map_data]) +- LogicalValues(tuples=[[{ 0 }]])

LogicalProject(select=[id, k, v, pos]) +- LogicalCorrelate(correlation=[$cor0], joinType=[inner], requiredColumns=[{1}]) :- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable]]) +- LogicalProject(select=[k, v, pos]) +- LogicalTableFunctionScan(invocation=[$UNNEST_ROWS_WITH_ORDINALITY$1($cor0.map_data)], rowType=[RecordType:peek_no_expand(VARCHAR(2147483647) f0, VARCHAR(2147483647) f1, INTEGER ORDINALITY)])

TestCase.name: testUnnestWithOrdinalityMultiset
TestCase.Resource: WITH T AS (SELECT a, COLLECT(c) as words FROM MyTable GROUP BY a) SELECT a, word, pos FROM T CROSS JOIN UNNEST(words) WITH ORDINALITY AS A(word, pos)

LogicalProject(select=[a, word, pos]) +- LogicalCorrelate(correlation=[$cor0], joinType=[inner], requiredColumns=[{1}]) :- LogicalAggregate(group=[{0}], words=[COLLECT($1)]) : +- LogicalProject(select=[a, c]) : +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable]]) +- LogicalProject(select=[word, pos]) +- Uncollect(withOrdinality=[true]) +- LogicalProject(words=[$cor0.words]) +- LogicalValues(tuples=[[{ 0 }]])

LogicalProject(select=[a, word, pos]) +- LogicalCorrelate(correlation=[$cor0], joinType=[inner], requiredColumns=[{1}]) :- LogicalAggregate(group=[{0}], words=[COLLECT($1)]) : +- LogicalProject(select=[a, c]) : +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable]]) +- LogicalProject(select=[word, pos]) +- LogicalTableFunctionScan(invocation=[$UNNEST_ROWS_WITH_ORDINALITY$1($cor0.words)], rowType=[RecordType:peek_no_expand(VARCHAR(2147483647) EXPR$0, INTEGER ORDINALITY)])

TestCase.name: testUnnestWithOrdinalityWithFilter
TestCase.Resource: SELECT a, number, ordinality FROM MyTable CROSS JOIN UNNEST(b) WITH ORDINALITY AS t(number, ordinality) WHERE number > 10 AND ordinality < 3

LogicalProject(select=[a, number, ordinality]) +- LogicalFilter(condition=[AND(>($2, 10), <($3, 3))]) +- LogicalCorrelate(correlation=[$cor0], joinType=[inner], requiredColumns=[{1}]) :- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable]]) +- LogicalProject(select=[number, ordinality]) +- Uncollect(withOrdinality=[true]) +- LogicalProject(b=[$cor0.b]) +- LogicalValues(tuples=[[{ 0 }]])

LogicalProject(select=[a, number, ordinality]) +- LogicalFilter(condition=[AND(>($2, 10), <($3, 3))]) +- LogicalCorrelate(correlation=[$cor0], joinType=[inner], requiredColumns=[{1}]) :- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable]]) +- LogicalProject(select=[number, ordinality]) +- LogicalTableFunctionScan(invocation=[$UNNEST_ROWS_WITH_ORDINALITY$1($cor0.b)], rowType=[RecordType:peek_no_expand(INTEGER EXPR$0, INTEGER ORDINALITY)])

TestCase.name: testUnnestWithValues
TestCase.Resource: SELECT * FROM UNNEST(ARRAY[1,2,3])
LogicalProject(select=[EXPR$0]) +- Uncollect +- LogicalProject(EXPR$0=[ARRAY(1, 2, 3)]) +- LogicalValues(tuples=[[{ 0 }]])
LogicalProject(select=[EXPR$0]) +- Uncollect +- LogicalProject(EXPR$0=[ARRAY(1, 2, 3)]) +- LogicalValues(tuples=[[{ 0 }]])
